org.spongepowered.api.text.format

Interface TextColor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TextColor.Base

    public interface TextColor
    A TextColor represents a color that a Message has. A list of the base text colors provided in Minecraft is provided in TextColors.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TextColor.Base
      A Base text color is one that is represented in Minecraft.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Color getColor()
      Returns the corresponding Color for this TextColor.
      boolean isReset()
      Returns whether this color is the reset color.

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        java.awt.Color getColor()
        Returns the corresponding Color for this TextColor.
        Returns:
        A Color

      • isReset

        boolean isReset()
        Returns whether this color is the reset color.
        Returns:
        A boolean for if this color is the reset color
